page.title: 01Upton Noble & Batcombe.
page.content:
Our block contains two villages,{ {Upton Noble}and{Batcombe. { { Upton Noble}(originally-Opetone) is an old village surrounded mostly by open dairy farmland.It is quiet, lightly populated and the pace of life is slow. Most{buildings}are built of stone and are old.The manor house is still in{Upton Noble.}
{Batcombe}is a small, sheltered village, completely enclosed by the {Mendip Hills.}Nearly every house is built of the local stone. { Even though the two villages are only 5 kilometres apart they are very different.{Upton Noble}is built on high ground whereas{Batcombe}nestles in a valley.
